description: Get ready for the holidays with this delicious holiday eggnog cocktail recipe. With the perfect balance of sweetness and&nbsp;spice, this drink is sure to be a hit at your next party!
name: Holiday Eggnog
recipeIngredient: Caramel sauce for rimming the glass

recipeInstructions.name: Rim a cocktail glass with caramel sauce.
recipeInstructions.text: Rim a cocktail glass with caramel sauce.

recipeInstructions.name: Put the eggnog and Amaretto in a shaker filled with half ice and then shake.
recipeInstructions.text: Put the eggnog and Amaretto in a shaker filled with half ice and then shake.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with more cinnamon.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with more cinnamon.
